title: The Harmonic Rescues of Pit Miller, The Singing Mentor

story.text: Pit Miller, a retired choir director, discovers his ability to control objects with his voice while teaching a singing lesson. Amazed, he vows to use his powers for good.
Test-driving his new abilities, Pit stops a robbery by singing a high note that freezes the thieves in place until the police arrive. His heroic act hits the local news.
Emboldened by his success, Pit starts mentoring at-risk youth, subtly using his powers to mend broken objects (and hearts) at the community center.
During a vocal session, a mild earthquake strikes. Pit calms panicking citizens with a soothing melody that oddly resonates with the earth, stopping the quake.
Pit is invited to a local talk show to discuss his heroic deeds and his passion for music and mentorship, inspiring listeners across the city.
At a large concert held to celebrate community spirit, Pit leads a choir of his mentees, using the harmony to repair a nearby crumbling historic monument.
Relaxing at home, Pit reflects on his week, realizing the impact his abilities and passion can have when combined. He plans more community projects.

ending: With a song in his heart and harmony at his fingertips, Pit Miller continued to tune the world to a better frequency.
moral: Use your unique talents to make a positive difference in the world.
